definition.text: Humans may access this information by using a cool trick that makes the charting space interact with the design space!

paragraphs.text: To use this trick, I just did the following:
Split the screen in half pulling the slider up so that we can see both spaces at the same time.
Turn on the Current Position layer on the Trading Engine layers manager. I chose this layer because it corresponds to this section of the hierarchy... tradingEngine.current.position, remember ?
Now, slide the mouse pointer across the candles on which the position is taken and see what happens on the nodes to the left...
